name: Bat
traits: Keen Hearing. The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.
summary: A nocturnal familiar that excels at scouting in the dark.

name: Cat
traits: Keen Smell. The cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
summary: A nimble prowler suited to stealthy reconnaissance.

name: Hawk
traits: Keen Sight. The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
summary: A sharp-eyed bird used to scout vast areas from above.

name: Owl
traits: Flyby. The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
Keen Hearing and Sight. The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.
summary: A silent hunter that avoids retaliation with swift flybys.

name: Weasel
traits: Keen Hearing and Smell. The weasel has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
summary: A slinking infiltrator adept at squeezing through tight spaces.
